reviewText: My students and I love Reading Rainbow
We have four reading rainbow DVDs. The kids ask to watch this one the most.

Love love love reading rainbow but this is not a favorite, despite lots of potential.  My 4 year old girl who is sensitive was scared of the stories of stranded animals and the overall theme was quite environmentalist.  I'm all for protecting our earth but I feel this show went a little too much into conservation at the expense of knowledge and conveying the magesty and fascination of the animals- allowing the children to WONDER (and develop a love of the earth and it's creatures incidentally).  That "wonder" is normally a strongpoint of the series I think.  This one didn't live up to its potential- Just ok.  Try Desert Life instead- it's awesome!
I purchased this dvd for my grandchildren and they along with the adults love it. Thank you for such wonderful stories.
Wonderful video. Both my kids (7 and 2) will watch it I together. I will be buying more of reading rainbow!

We have four of these dvd's.  Different people read two stories.  In this particular video the stories are true.  Then LeVar talks about ocean life in a captivating manner.  My children watch these videos over and over.

There are also extras that are great fun to watch.  One of them has LeVar riding a train, another he is learning to fly an airplane.  Everybody really enjoys these videos.
Great flim about true whale and manatee stories.  Also containe real footage of ocean life.  A wonderful teaching tool as well as a good movie for the whole family.
